trans-unit.source: Represents a placeholder (bookmark) within an event stream.
trans-unit.target: Representa um marcador de posição (marcadores) dentro de um fluxo de eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the placeholder to mark a position and return to this position in a stream of events.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o marcador de posição para marcar uma posição e regressar nesta posição numa transmissão em fluxo de eventos.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object can be obtained from an <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord"></xref> object, in which case it corresponds to the position of that event record.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância deste objeto pode ser obtida a partir de um <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord"> </xref> objeto, caso em que corresponde à posição desse registo de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instances.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"> </xref> classe a partir de especificado <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>instâncias.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto que contém as informações necessárias para serializar o novo <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objeto que contém a origem da sequência serializada que estão associada com o novo <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto para preencher com dados.
